description:
The strengths of Team Toguro are revealed in full as they take the arena floor. Meanwhile, Yusuke is caught in a deep slumber as Genkai heads off to face her former partner in battle – and settle a 50 year old score!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shukumei no Taiketsu! Toguro no Kage
Un adversar foarte puternic. Umbra lui Toguro
宿命の対決! 戸愚呂の影
